I just wanted to update people who are here on the SHQ mailing list that 
a=
s of right now it is not 100% clear that the tech people with the hosting 
=
people with the company can restore the site.  I will try to chat with 
the=
m on Monday.  Fortunately our moderator Barb had a back up of the 
site and=
 so if the tech people can't assist---we still have our data.

So what will=
 happen now?

I will devote as much as possible to arrange the data into a =
draft for an 
e-book and then work with another researcher who can oversee =
other 
details.  The book will have many footnotes and the citations will b=
e in 
place to allow readers to do their own double checking if they desire=
.

As we work on this new phase of the SHQ data I will post requests here 
=
on the list to encourage contributions from members here.  

The e-book wil=
l not incorporate details regarding the Shinsengumi in 
fiction, with the e=
xception of the filmography (written by Michael of the 
Ninja Dojo) and mor=
e general mentions (such as popular manga/anime 
which are already part of =
the Shinsengumi legacy).  Details regarding 
minor fiction releases (like S=
hinsengumi trading cards or non-exported 
vid games) will be posted on the =
site and also 
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com because there is new in=
formation 
every month (I keep up with the new with the google alert system=
 using 
the keyword "shinsengumi").

Thus, SHQ will provide data in the for=
m of an e-book which can be 
downloaded, however images (many of which are =
from the Kyoto 
Museum book or other Japanese sites) cannot be part of the =
e-book---
we will continue to host those images on the site in such a way y=
ou can 
match images chapter by chapter.

We are currently researching copy=
right options---however if the cost is 
simply too high or the legal matter=
s too complex then we will go ahead 
and risk being plagiarized because we =
do want to make the info 
available.  Certain parts  of SHQ is not only der=
ived work or "quoted 
from such and such a book", there was also some prett=
y original 
research and we still have so many leads we can't follow up on =
right 
now.  I will take advantage of this opportunity (during the e-book 
=
adaption) to include recommendations on how to further specific angles 
(on=
ly on chapters I will assist in writing).

So thank you for staying with th=
is list for all these years and please feel 
free to post your thoughts on =
the list or you can contact me or any one 
else by sending emails (just cli=
ck on the yahoo profile).
